nixd.nixpkgs.expr: let findFlake = dir: if builtins.pathExists (dir + "/flake.nix") then builtins.getFlake ("git+file://" + toString dir) else if toString dir == "/" then throw "No flake.nix found" else findFlake (dir + "/.."); flake = findFlake ./.; in flake.inputs.nixpkgs {}

nixos.expr: let findFlake = dir: if builtins.pathExists (dir + "/flake.nix") then builtins.getFlake ("git+file://" + toString dir) else if toString dir == "/" then throw "No flake.nix found" else findFlake (dir + "/.."); flake = findFlake ./.; in flake.nixosConfigurations.nas.options
